introSection.title: Book Your Therapy Session Today
paragraphs: Our therapy session will be a one-hour online session. Please complete our Consultation Form and submit the session fee of â‚¹1000. Once the payment is made, kindly send a screenshot of the payment to +91 1234567890. Then your booking will be confirmed.

If the selected time slot is unavailable due to full bookings, we will propose an alternative date and time for your session. Should this suggested schedule not be convenient, you are welcome to propose another suitable day and time.
If a suitable time cannot be arranged and you wish to cancel, and you want back your money, your payment will be fully refunded, ensuring a smooth and flexible booking process.

contactInfo.title: Appointment Hours
contactInfo.description: You can book your slot on three working days of the week during the following hours

contactInfo.title: Connect with Us
contactInfo.description: Contact us by phone to discuss your needs, or receive further assistance with our services.

contactInfo.title: Support Contacts
contactInfo.description: Please email us with your inquiries, and we will respond promptly.
